channel.title: Personal Preference,
channel.description:
Well I got bored of my old project as it is the same old server that everyone has now-adays. So what I really want to know is what the people of MoparScape think.
Would you prefer and ol' school server with object training and in Varrock but with much more detail then the one's before? (One of the most asked about servers from people).
Or
An economy-based server using the 459 client with the latest item being skill capes.
Either way both servers will be using the 459 client, so please post you're opinion, also please don't post saying a different protocol. Thanks.
